name: Damian Franciszek Pospiech
profile_summary:
Results-driven Software Engineer with 13+ years of expertise in software engineering and AI model training. Adept at developing comprehensive technical assessments and rubrics, designing challenging programming tasks, and leveraging an analytical mindset to enhance learning experiences. Solid understanding of emerging trends in AI and commitment to fostering collaboration and clear communication in team settings. 
Proficient in **JavaScript**, **TypeScript**, **Python**, and **Flutter**, with extensive experience in building high-performance applications across healthcare and financial sectors. Hands-on expertise in both frontend and backend development utilizing **React**, **Next.js**, **Vue**, **Node.js**, **FastAPI**, and **Django**. 
Experienced in deploying cloud-native systems on **AWS** and **Azure**, implementing microservices, event-driven architectures, and CI/CD pipelines to optimize delivery. Well-versed in developing AI/ML-powered platforms that support predictive analytics and automation while adhering to compliance-driven development standards like HIPAA, FHIR, PCI DSS, and SOC 2. Strong background in MLOps, encompassing model training, serving, and orchestration with **MLflow**, **Airflow**, and **Kubeflow**.

experience.responsibilities:
• Applied advanced **computer science** principles and **software engineering** methodologies to develop full-stack platforms for healthcare and fintech, utilizing **Python (FastAPI)**, **TypeScript**, and **Node.js**.
• Executed **AI model training** strategies through deployment of ML models for risk scoring and fraud detection using **scikit-learn**, **PyTorch**, and **TensorFlow**, integrated with live systems for real-time inference.
• Conducted thorough **technical assessments** of legacy systems, transforming them into scalable microservices with **Docker**, **Kubernetes (AKS/EKS)**, and **AWS Lambda**.
• Designed and implemented rigorous **rubrics development** processes in CI/CD pipelines for mobile applications using **Fastlane** and **App Center**, ensuring full automation and robust crash analytics with **Firebase Crashlytics** and **Sentry**.
• Developed engaging **programming challenges** for integrating predictive features into applications, leveraging intelligent dashboards powered by models hosted on **Azure ML** and **AWS Sagemaker**.
• Fostered strong **communication skills** through collaboration with ML teams to deploy **NLP models (spaCy, Hugging Face Transformers)** for document parsing, enhancing the functionality of APIs.
• Encouraged a culture of **collaboration** by mentoring peers on best practices for DevOps pipelines built with **GitHub Actions**, **CircleCI**, and **Azure DevOps** to streamline deployment workflows.
• Engaged with emerging trends in **AI** and data analytics, developing visualization tools using **D3.js**, **Chart.js**, and **Power BI Embedded** for insightful analysis of financial data, monitoring key performance indicators.
• Maintained a robust testing framework across the stack utilizing **Jest**, **Cypress**, **Postman**, and **PyTest**, ensuring comprehensive unit and E2E test coverage for deployed applications.
• Integrated search capabilities through **Azure Cognitive Search** and **Elasticsearch**, supporting advanced querying for both structured and unstructured datasets in health and finance domains.

Utilized an **analytical mindset** to assess and implement best practices in **software engineering** to enhance project outcomes.
Conducted technical assessments by developing tailored **rubrics** and **programming challenges** to evaluate candidates' skills effectively.
Collaborated with team members to identify **emerging trends in AI**, integrating findings into training modules to enhance learning experiences.
Modernized core financial platforms by migrating to microservices architecture using **Node.js** (**NestJS/Express**) and **Python** (**FastAPI, Django**), enhancing scalability and performance for **high-volume transactional systems** handling over **100,000 transactions per hour**.
Built interactive front-end applications with **React (18)**, **Vue 3**, **Next.js**, and **TypeScript**, utilizing **Redux Toolkit** and **Tailwind CSS** to create sleek, responsive interfaces for financial tools and admin panels.
Delivered real-time analytics dashboards with **React**, **D3.js**, and **Power BI Embedded**, providing operations teams with instant insights into transactions and anomalies, reducing incident response time by **30%**.
Designed and deployed a robust event-driven architecture using **Kafka**, **RabbitMQ**, and **Azure Service Bus**, ensuring asynchronous communication across critical workflows such as payments, alerts, and compliance.
Developed ETL pipelines for ingesting financial data from internal and third-party sources using **Python**, **Apache Airflow**, and **Azure Data Factory**, supporting both batch and real-time processing with a throughput of **1TB** of data daily.
Built and deployed machine learning models for fraud detection using **scikit-learn**, **XGBoost**, and **Azure ML**, enabling proactive detection of suspicious activity based on user behavior and transaction patterns, increasing detection accuracy by **25%**.
Created ML pipelines for real-time credit scoring, churn prediction, and transaction classification, leveraging **MLflow** and **Airflow** to integrate model inference into backend services.

Utilized strong **computer science** and **software engineering** principles to design innovative programming challenges and technical assessments for AI model training.
Developed and implemented rubrics for evaluating AI training processes, ensuring high-quality benchmarks and standardization across the project.
Collaborated with cross-functional teams to identify **emerging trends in AI**, enhancing the relevance and applicability of training materials to real-world scenarios.
Applied an analytical mindset to assess the performance and effectiveness of AI models, providing insightful feedback for continuous improvement.
Facilitated effective communication throughout the software development lifecycle, ensuring clarity of objectives and expectations among team members.
Engaged in collaborative efforts to share knowledge and insights, fostering a culture of learning and innovation focused on AI technology advancements.
Leveraged tools and frameworks such as **TensorFlow** and **scikit-learn** to create and refine AI models, demonstrating proficiency in applied AI methodologies.
Led hands-on workshops and training sessions, successfully guiding at least **30** participants in understanding complex AI concepts and applications.
Conducted rigorous testing and validation of AI models, presenting findings and recommendations in clear, data-driven reports to stakeholders every **quarter**.
Monitored project progress and adjusted methodologies based on real-time feedback, achieving a **20%** improvement in training efficiency over **6 months**.
